`APedro, at six he started writing a letter. BAt eight, he had almost finished the letter,

APedro-e' las sèeys káa h chúun u ts'íib-t-ik hun-p'éel kàarta. Las òocho-e' ta'itak u ts'o'k-s-ik le kàarta-o', káa t-u k'at-ah u báah Pablo, káa t-u p'at-ah u ts'íib Pedro, káa h p'áat le kàarta bèey ma' h ts'o'k-o'. Las dòose-e', káa t-uy a'l-ah Pedro t-uy atan: "Las òocho-e' ta'itak in ts'íib-t-ik hun-p'éel kàarta, káa h tàal Pablo, káa h p'áat ma' h bèey-chah-i'.

I almost wrote a letter), (when) Pablo came (and) I ended up undone (more lit. it remained not having being possible).
